start.text: Pastry chef! Sing with me! I hope you are not tone deaf.

bad_singing.text: You're right, your singing could cause mayhem! Fire, hell, and brimstone, that would be a gem! Pastry chef, have you brought me any sweets? The only food this blasted party has are deviled eggs and minced meats.

options.text: Yeah, actually, I do. The good stuff is in the...

wrong_location.text: That doesn't sound right! Are you trying to give me a fright?

options.text: My mistake, I meant the Kitchen.

success_lure.text: Hooray! I hope you will provide me with an entire tray.

options.text: Follow me and I'll give them to you!.
